1002506.specialexteriorcolorflag=false 1002506.1000851.1000867.1000976.title=Trailer Ball [parts_only_msrp] 1002506.1000851.1000865.1000984.msrp=29 1002506.1000851.1000869.1000920.description=Designed and engineered to work together, the trailer ball and ball mount are built and tested to meet your Venza’s exact towing capacity.
•Cold-forged stainless steel construction helps provide superior strength
•Available in a variety of trailer ball diameters
•Optimized placement provides precise drop/rise to maintain vehicle departure angle
•On-road testing of trailer ball and ball mount helps ensure towing system quality
•Chrome plating on trailer ball

Trailer ball and ball mount sold separately.

Before towing, confirm that your vehicle and trailer are compatible, properly hooked up and loaded, and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Rating and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of your cargo, occupants and available equipment. 1002506.1000851.1000867.1000975.title=Trailer Ball [parts_only_msrp] 1002506.1000851.1000866.1000939.title=Trailer Ball [parts_only_msrp] 1002506.1000851.1000857.1000960.title=Trailer Ball [parts_only_msrp] 1002506.1000851.1000865.description=Designed and engineered to work together, the trailer ball and ball mount are built and tested to meet your Sequoia's exact towing capacity.
• Cold-forged steel construction helps provide superior strength.
• Available in a variety of ball diameters
• Optimized placement provides precise drop/rise to maintain vehicle departure angle
• On-road testing of trailer ball and ball mount helps ensure towing system quality
• Chrome plating on trailer ball

Ball mount and trailer ball are sold separately. Before towing, confirm that your vehicle and trailer are compatible and properly hooked up and loaded, and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Rating and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of your cargo, occupants and available equipment. 1002506.1000851.1000867.1000963.group=Exterior 1002506.1000851.1000867.1000965.title=Trailer Ball [parts_only_msrp] 1002506.1000851.1000866.1000940.keyfeatures= 1002506.1000851.1000867.1000964.description=This Genuine Toyota trailer ball is specifically designed to work in harmony with the Toyota ball mount:
•Available in 2 5/16-in. or 2-in. diameters
•Cold-forged steel construction for superior strength
•Includes built-in wrench flats for ease of installation and torquing
•Ball mount sold separately

Before towing, confirm your vehicle and trailer are compatible, hooked up and loaded properly and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Ratings and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of any cargo, occupants and available equipment.

Not all models can tow 5,000 lbs. Do not exceed any Weight Rating and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of your cargo, occupants and available equipment. 1002506.1000851.1000866.1000940.pnglayeringinclusionkey= 1002506.1000851.1000867.1000974.description=This Genuine Toyota trailer ball is specifically designed to work in harmony with the Toyota ball mount:
•Available in 2 5/16-in. or 2-in. diameters

•Ball mount sold separately

Before towing, confirm your vehicle and trailer are compatible, hooked up and loaded properly and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Ratings and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of any cargo, occupants and available equipment.
